{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07536v1", "title": "Criteria for finite injective dimension of modules over a local ring", "summary": "Let $R$ be a commutative Noetherian local ring. We prove that the finiteness
of the injective dimension of a finitely generated $R$-module $C$ is determined
by the existence of a Cohen--Macaulay module $M$ that satisfies an inequality
concerning multiplicity and type, together with the vanishing of finitely many
Ext modules. As applications, we recover a result of Rahmani and Taherizadeh
and provide sufficient conditions for a finitely generated $R$-module to have
finite injective dimension.", "main_category": "math.AC", "categories": "math.AC", "published": "2025-04-10T08:02:23Z"}
